data.name: Love Fantasy
data.detailed_description:
⭐⭐⭐ RECENT RELEASES⭐⭐⭐

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1831680
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1602490


About the Game

You are an ordinary person from the real world of 2021 and pulled into a fantasy world. Then you reluctantly become a hero to save the goddesses whose tasks were to create and preserve lives. Learn skills, buy items, upgrade stats, and so on to defeat the enemies.

Features:

  • A branching storyline.
  • Tactics and fun match 3 puzzle game.
  • Special skills & items to counter challenging enemies.
  • High-quality artworks of characters and backgrounds.

Hikaru


Hikaru fears loneliness and isolation the most, and because of this, she needs reassurance almost constantly. While she reciprocates willingly and generously, her dependence on the attention of others leaves her vulnerable and desperate.

Iwe


Iwe feels unappreciated and taken for granted. While she does provide the essential strength that keeps the Unity continuing and the auras intermingling, she feels that her needs have gone unheard and unacknowledged.

Odine


Ondine frequently gets lost in her reveries which she seems to prefer over what she considers harsh reality, no matter how pleasant reality may actually be.

Silvia

Silvia feels resentment towards those who are greedy and take more from her than they actually need. What’s more, she is deeply hurt when those same people deny her gifts to others.

Chryseia

Chryseia has always kept her distance from humanity because she has seen them do great good, she has also seen them do great evil as well.

data.short_description: Love Fantasy combines match-3, beauties, and visual novel elements. Become a hero to save the beautiful goddesses whose tasks were to create and preserve lives. Learn skills, buy items, upgrade stats, and so on to defeat the enemies.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Dual or AMD Equivalent
  • Graphics: HD Intel Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: General Mature Content.
All character are over 18 year old.
